/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is divided into two lanes by a white line, with a third lane reserved for bicycles. A black car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene.

The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a verdant canopy over the road. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sides of the street, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

The sky above is a hazy gray, casting a soft light over the scene. Despite the absence of sunshine, the image is far from gloomy. Instead, it conveys a sense of calm and order, a typical day in the life of this vibrant city.
